revision.comment: [[WP:AWB/GF#Talk page general fixes|Talk page general fixes]] & other cleanup using [[Project:AWB|AWB]] (9387)
revision.text:
{{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Military history|class=GA|Maritime=yes|French=yes}} {{WikiProject Ships|class=GA}} {{WikiProject France}} }}{{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=06:47, 1 April 2010 (UTC) |action1link=Talk:French cruiser Pluton/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=353304212 |dykdate=18 February 2010 |dykentry=... that the [[France|French]] fast [[minelayer|minelaying cruiser]] '''{{ship|French cruiser|Pluton||2}}''' exploded in [[Casablanca]] Harbor, [[French protectorate of Morocco|French Morocco]] on 13 September 1939 while disembarking [[fuze]]d [[Naval mine|mines]]? |currentstatus=GA |topic=War }} == Requested move ==
:''The following discussion is an archived discussion of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on the talk page. No further edits should be made to this section. '' The result of the move request was: '''page moved'''. '''[[User:MikeLynch|Lynch]][[User talk:MikeLynch|7]]''' 13:22, 23 January 2012 (UTC) ---- ---- [[French cruiser Pluton]] → [[French minelaying cruiser Pluton]] – This appears to be the official, and most commonly used, name for the type of the ship, and is descriptive of the ship's actual mission. - [[User:The Bushranger|The Bushranger]] [[User talk:The Bushranger|One ping only]] 03:33, 11 January 2012 (UTC) :Fine by me, but be advised that there will never be a class article for this single-ship class so your preemptive disambiguation for the earlier class is unnecessary.--[[User:Sturmvogel 66|Sturmvogel 66]] ([[User talk:Sturmvogel 66|talk]]) 05:49, 11 January 2012 (UTC) ::I wasn't sure if that was necessary or not - decided to be bold, if you don't think it's necessary feel free to move it back without any complaints from me. :) - [[User:The Bushranger|The Bushranger]] [[User talk:The Bushranger|One ping only]] 07:56, 11 January 2012 (UTC) :''The above discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on this talk page. No further edits should be made to this section.
==Armament== Both Jordan and Guglini confirm mle 1923 guns were used on this ship, not mle 1927.--[[User:Sturmvogel 66|Sturmvogel 66]] ([[User talk:Sturmvogel 66|talk]]) 15:20, 15 April 2012 (UTC)
